item.name: Rapier
item.desc: Effective against horseback and armoured units

item.name: Runesword
item.desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Drains HP from enemy

item.name: Wind Sword
item.desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Effective against fliers

item.name: Reginleif
item.desc: Effective against horseback and armoured units

item.name: Swordslayer
item.desc: Reverses the weapon triangle. Effective against sword fighters

item.name: Glimmer Ward
item.desc: Lowers enemy accuracy slightly on hit.

item.name: Fortune
item.desc: Ally gains +50 accuracy until next turn.

item.name: Mend
item.desc: Restores (User's Magic + 10) HP to self and all adjacent allies.

item.name: Restore
item.target_restrict: any(status.negative and status.time for status in target.status_effects)

item.name: Refresh
item.desc: Allows a unit to move again.

item.name: Sandblast
item.desc: Affects medium sized area. Blinds foes.

item.name: Blizzard
item.desc: Damages huge area. Inflicts SPD debuff.

item.name: Fly
item.custom_ai: not 'Rex_Aegis' in [s.id for s in target.status_effects]

item.name: Flux Ward
item.desc: Lowers enemy avoid slightly on hit.

item.name: Nyx Ward
item.desc: Recover HP equal to half damage dealt.

item.name: Ruin Ward
item.desc: Does half damage even on miss.

item.name: Pure Water
item.desc: A draught that boosts the user's RES.

item.name: Angelic Robe
item.desc: Permanently raises maximum HP by 7 points.

item.name: Metis's Tome
item.desc: Permanently raises all of the user's growth rates by 5.
